name: BurnAware File List
summary: Learn about .BAFL files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: BAFL files can be created by selecting "Save File List..." from the Compilation menu. They can be loaded into the program by selecting "Load File List..."

description: Text file created with BurnAware disc burning software; contains a list of data files that can be burned to a CD, DVD, or Blu-ray disc; saved in an XML format with one file per line.
